strings.Value: "I'd never imagined that you and I would be standing shoulder to shoulder in the end."
"Do you have anything to say to me?"
"Enough — it's time to put an end to this Eldest and his minions!"
{n}As you approach, Tartuk tilts his head and looks at you intently with his reptilian eye.{/n} "Ssso? When isss the battle?"
{n}The kobold shakes his head.{/n} "It'sss an honor. You are the sssavior of my kingdom. Now I am the sssavior of yoursss. A little. But ssstill."

{n}Tartuk keeps silent for a few seconds, and then starts speaking in a voice not his own, slow and dull.{/n} "I wanted to be great. Do sssomething important. If it wasssn't for you, I wouldn't be able to give koboldsss a home. Thank you."
{n}In return, the purple kobold opens his toothy maw and hisses viciously. Magic sparks run along his clawed fingers — Tartuk is ready for the final battle!{/n}
